name: Tomato's Ace
description:
Tomato's Ace

Help the main character, the police tomato Pedro, investigate the robbery of the casino and find the culprit, along the way, collect the remnants of the revived gambling and return them to their rightful owner. For resources collected from enemies, the casino owner will reward Pedro with a random bonus that will help or hurt in battle. 

Will Pedro find out who robbed the casino? You will find out with him after completing the game. 

Have a good game!
